keyMoments.title: Captured by Fish-Man Island Locals
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Chopper, Hatchan, and Sanji are captured and tied up by local fish-men who believe they're kidnapping Princess Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the ongoing tension and mistrust between the Straw Hats and the fish-men populace.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Debuts Jet Hammer Technique
keyMoments.description: Luffy showcases his post-timeskip strength by debuting Gomu Gomu no Jet Hammer to defeat Vander Decken IX.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's increased power after the two-year timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Escape to the Sea Forest
keyMoments.description: Luffy and part of the crew escape with Shirahoshi on Megalo, heading to the Sea Forest.
keyMoments.significance: Advances the crew's involvement in protecting Shirahoshi and sets up the meeting with Jinbe.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Defeats Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Zoro demonstrates the crew's post-timeskip power by easily defeating Hody Jones underwater.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that the Straw Hats have grown strong enough to handle the threats on Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Vander Decken Confronts Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Captain Vander Decken IX appears in person to confront Princess Shirahoshi, escalating his pursuit from distant threats to direct confrontation.
keyMoments.significance: Brings the Flying Pirates into direct conflict with the Straw Hats who are protecting Shirahoshi.

keyMoments.title: Captain Defeated by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken IX is defeated by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Jet Hammer technique.
keyMoments.significance: First major defeat for the Flying Pirates' captain, though he will recover and continue his pursuit.

keyMoments.title: Wadatsumi Attempts to Stop Escape
keyMoments.description: Crew member Wadatsumi attempts to prevent the Straw Hats' escape but is struck by Luffy's Jet Pistol.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the power difference between the Flying Pirates and the post-timeskip Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Hody Dismisses Nami and Camie's Escape
keyMoments.description: When informed that Nami and Camie escaped from Ryugu Palace, Captain Hody Jones dismisses it as unimportant.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hody's arrogance and underestimation of the Straw Hats, which will prove to be a mistake.

keyMoments.title: Captain Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones is seemingly defeated by Zoro's Lion Strike technique at Ryugu Palace.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that without Energy Steroids, the New Fish-Man Pirates' captain is no match for the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Energy Steroids Recognized as Threat
keyMoments.description: King Neptune recognizes that the Energy Steroids used by the New Fish-Man Pirates are a serious threat.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the crew's reliance on the dangerous Energy Steroids and the devastating effects they will have.
